publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6914 Jackie Baillie: Entrepreneurial Success—That the Parliament congratulates Fraser Gibson and Asif Ali on their recent success in the Prince’s Scottish Youth Business Trust (PSYBT) Young Entrepreneur of the Year Awards; understands that Fraser and Asif, both of Dumbarton, finished first and second respectively in the awards; notes that Fraser Gibson’s company, United Sports USA, is an international sports scholarship consultancy that helps young talented athletes from across Scotland gain sports scholarships to American universities and colleges; further notes that Asif Ali’s company, Palladium Executive Hire, specialises in offering luxury cars for weddings and corporate and private parties; commends both men for being what it considers to be excellent role models for budding young entrepreneurs, and wishes both businesses the greatest of success for the future.
S3M-6914 Entrepreneurial Success (lodged on 6 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*, Margaret Curran*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-6914 Entrepreneurial Success (lodged on 6 September 2010) Robin Harper*
S3M-6914 Entrepreneurial Success (lodged on 6 September 2010) Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*
